Reentrancy in Crowdsale.investInternal (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#356-408):
	External calls:
	- getState() == State.PreFunding (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#364-378)
	- tokenAmount = pricingStrategy.calculatePrice(weiAmount,weiRaised,tokensSold,msg.sender,token.decimals()) (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#378-381)

	External calls:
	- tokenAmount = fullTokens * 10 ** token.decimals() (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#425-427)

Crowdsale.getState (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#640-673) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp <= endsAt && ! isCrowdsaleFull() (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#657-673)
	- block.timestamp < startsAt (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#657-673)

ERC20.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#172)
FractionalERC20.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#198)
PresaleFundCollector.MAX_INVESTORS should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x70b0505c0653e0fed13d2f0924ad63cdf39edefe.sol#739-741)
